title: I swear we used to be able to undo some purchases even if we'd JUST left the fountain?
body: Like, I swear we used to be able to... What happened to that :'(

replies.body: Never been able to do that in my experience.
same. Maybe OP was sneakily on the edge of the fountain while undoing purchases?
hahah nah i swear dude i'd actually step outta the fountain and it'd let me :/

Maybe you were thinking of the period in time when the shop had a different radius which wasnt directly on the fountain, but spread slightly in favour of top lane due to the position of the shopkeeper. This was changed a little while back for clarity/balance across lanes. Although I don't believe there was ever a time where you could run out of the shop range and back in to refund anything. 

If you buy an item and deal/take any form of damage from something like a nid/cait/teemo/jhin trap then this would stop your refund as well. Just in case this could have been an issue you have experienced.
